name: Whatever Possessed You?
description:
You are a malevolent spirit, looking for another shot at life.

It just so happens every halloween night the spirits of the dead can try to possess one of the living.

With some effort, you manage to possess one of the guests at a halloween party! Their entire life flashes before you - but you don't have long.

If you can avoid the suspicion of Sara, host of the party,  then maybe she can be possessed by your dead wife! And you can both 'live' happily ever after!

If only you can convince her you're the real thing...
